name: @radix-tribes/backend
description: Backend server for Radix Tribes game

scripts.start: echo 'Starting with migration resolution...' && node resolve-migration.js && echo 'Migration resolution complete, starting server...' && node dist/server.js
scripts.start:skip-migrations: echo 'Skipping migrations, using embedded resolution...' && node dist/server.js
scripts.db:migrate:safe: npm run db:migrate:resolve && npm run db:migrate
